Name: Bridge to Nowhere
About the game: Step onto a squeaky bridge 80 feet in the air. High winds surround you as you look over the town Can you overcome your fears of going over the edge? Do you have what it takes to walk off? Bridge to Nowhere is a fantastic way to introduce newcomers to VR. It is immersive and exierating, taking advantage of both room scale and tracked controllers.
